00008 StatisticsMean::StatisticsMean()
00009   : RunningSum(0.), RunningSum2(0.), PathsDone(0)
00010 {
00011 
00012 }
00013 
00014 void StatisticsMean::AddOneResult( double result )
00015 {
00016   // Adding in one result
00017   // Hence, increment PathsDone by one, add the result to the running sum,
00018   // add the squre to RunningSum2
00019   PathsDone++;
00020   RunningSum += result;
00021   RunningSum2 += result*result;
00022 }
00023 
00024 void StatisticsMean::AddOneSetOfResults( long Number_, 
00025         std::vector<std::vector<double> > &ResultsSoFar_ )
00026 {
00027   PathsDone += Number_;
00028 
00029   // ResultsSoFar_ is passed in as two elements: the mean and the standard deviation
00030   double mean, sd, num;
00031   num = static_cast<double>(Number_);
00032   mean = ResultsSoFar_[0][0];
00033   sd = ResultsSoFar_[0][1];
00034 
00035   // ... but we store internally as total total of squares
00036   // now convert from mean, sd to total, total of squres
00037   RunningSum += mean * num;
00038   RunningSum2 += (sd*sd*num + mean*mean) * num;
00039 }
00040 
00041 void StatisticsMean::Reset()
00042 {
00043   PathsDone = 0;
00044   RunningSum = 0.;
00045   RunningSum2 = 0.;
00046 }
00047 
00048 void StatisticsMean::SetResultsSoFar( long Number_, 
00049         std::vector<std::vector<double> > &ResultsSoFar_ )
00050 {
00051   Reset();
00052   AddOneSetOfResults( Number_, ResultsSoFar_ );
00053 }
00054 
00055 std::vector<std::vector<double> > StatisticsMean::GetResultsSoFar() const
00056 {
00057   // Construct our 2D vector
00058   std::vector<std::vector<double> > Results(1);
00059   Results[0].resize(2);
00060 
00061   // Calculate the mean and standard deviation
00062   Results[0][0] = RunningSum / PathsDone;
00063   Results[0][1] = sqrt( (RunningSum2 / PathsDone - Results[0][0]*Results[0][0]) / PathsDone );
00064 
00065   return Results;
00066 }
00067 
00068 StatisticsMC* StatisticsMean::clone() const
00069 {
00070   return new StatisticsMean(*this);
00071 }
00072 
00073 std::ostream& operator<< ( std::ostream& out, const StatisticsMean& stats )
00074 {
00075   std::vector<std::vector<double> > theResults = stats.GetResultsSoFar();
00076   double mean = theResults[0][0];
00077   double sd = theResults[0][1];
00078 
00079   out << mean << " " << sd << " " << stats.PathsDone;
00080 
00081   return ( out );
00082 }
00083 
00084 std::istream& operator>> ( std::istream& in, StatisticsMean& stats )
00085 {
00086   std::vector<std::vector<double> > theResults( 1 );
00087   theResults[0].resize(2);
00088   unsigned long pathsDone;
00089 
00090   double mean;
00091   double sd;
00092 
00093   in >> mean >> sd >> pathsDone;
00094   theResults[0][0] = mean;
00095   theResults[0][1] = sd;
00096 
00097   stats.SetResultsSoFar( pathsDone, theResults );
00098  
00099   return ( in );
00100 }
